data.title: King Size Burgers
data.text: Good to have king size burger when you are cawing with  empty stomach and yummy fries as always. They never let me down :)

data.title: Friendly and quick
data.text:
The staff is friendly and they prepare everything really quickly.
There are a lot of restaurants in the area but if you look for something like 
a sandwich, this Burger King store is a great choice!

data.title: I wanted more bacon!
data.text: My husband and I were starving and had just checked into our room. This was an easy walk across the parking lot to get to. My husband and I both ordered the bacon cheese whopper meals and received 2 free ice creams because of the promotion Burger King was running. The food was absolutely delcicious as it should have been. There was only one problem. Upon inspection of our whoppers mine only had 2 extremely small slices of bacon on it, and my husbands only had one. so much for a "bacon" cheese whopper. I mean the slices were so small it was ridiculous, it would have made more sense if we had ordered whoppers with cheese and they accidentally let some bacon slip onto our burgers. aside from that, everything else was perfect.
